programme.title: Santa Tell Me
programme.desc: A design show host finds a letter from Santa promising to meet her true love, a man named Nick, by Christmas Eve. Meeting three Nicks complicates her search.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy dismays when her daughter is too forgiving of her unfaithful husband.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy becomes romantically interested in Frank Leahy, a fellow teacher whom she later discovers is a priest.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: After attending a sorority reunion, Blanche considers having a face lift.

programme.desc: One of Dorothy's pupils may face deportation, and she feels responsible.

programme.desc: Blanche announces that she is canceling a date with her latest boyfriend, because he does not meet her standards.

programme.desc: Lorelai and Emily spend a weekend at a health spa; unwelcome visitors spoil Rory's plans for an evening alone.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: When Luke is overwhelmed with funeral arrangements for his dead uncle, Lorelai and Rory help out by working the counter at the diner.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: When Rory asks her grandfather for help in creating a first-aid kit for teens, his pleasure at working on a new project prompts him to end his retirement.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: When a car crash lands Rory in the hospital, Lorelai lashes out at Luke for putting the girl in danger.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba discovers that her husband is leaving her for his pregnant girlfriend and that her 17-year-old daughter is pregnant as well.

programme.desc: Through a series of flashbacks, the housemates reminisce about their birthday celebrations.

programme.desc: The women try to help a neighborhood couple, George and Renee Corliss, patch up their faltering marriage.

programme.desc: The housemates recall some of their absurd moneymaking schemes.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The housemates could earn $100,000 if they adopt an elderly pig.

programme.desc: Rory is flustered around Dean; Lorelai must cancel a date with Rory's teacher to attend Cinnamon's funeral.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Emily throws an elegant birthday party for an embarrassed Rory, who blows up at her grandmother; Rory later invites her grandparents to a wild party.

programme.title: Autumn in the City
programme.desc: As she bounces between temporary jobs, an optimistic woman and her jaded neighbor discover the beauty of New York City together.

programme.title: A Greek Recipe for Romance
programme.desc: While visiting her mother in Greece, Abby decides to open a restaurant with a man she just met.

programme.title: Falling in Love in Niagara
programme.desc: When her fiance leaves her right before the wedding, Madeline goes to Niagara Falls to honeymoon without him. She soon finds new love while reconnecting with her adventurous side.

programme.title: Sweeter Than Chocolate
programme.desc: A local chocolatier is rumored to have the secret recipe to finding true love on Valentine's Day, drawing in a television reporter to investigate.

programme.title: Villa Amore
programme.desc: Liara goes to Italy and impulsively buys the villa where her parents met. She soon learns she is in way over her head and must ask a lawyer-turned-handyman to help her renovate.

programme.title: The Groomsmen First Look
programme.desc: A pediatrician and an overseas doctor, meet at a wedding in Philadelphia, but the long distance, family, and their friends may hinder their budding romance.

programme.title: Double Scoop
programme.desc: Nora discovers the best ice cream and hopes to land them as a client. Her sweet dreams hit a snag when her former colleague James has the same idea. Old sparks begin to melt the frosty tension. Stars Taylor Cole, Ryan McPartlin.

programme.desc: Angelique, a ghost who mistakes Brian for her own dead fianc√©, disrupts his wedding with Jane.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Courtesy of their new housekeeper's magic potions, Blanche's social life perks up and Dorothy wins the battle against insomnia.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The women confront their phobias on a flight to the Bahamas to attend a funeral.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: A political candidate announces that he had an affair with Blanche, a contention that she denies.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy makes her ex-husband, Stanley Zbornak, jealous when she has an affair with his brother Theodore.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Rory doesn't tell her mother about her first kiss with Dean, and a vexed Lorelai embarrasses her daughter by inviting Dean over to the house to watch videos.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Rory is stranded at her grandparents' house by a snowstorm; Lorelai spends the night with Rory's teacher, Max; the townspeople re-enact a Revolutionary War battle.

programme.title: Notes of Autumn
programme.desc: A classically trained pianist from the city and her best friend from the country swap homes to recharge their passions.

programme.title: The Perfect Setting
programme.desc: An aspiring jewelry designer returns to Belgium to visit her grandfather and hopefully win the Valentine's Day Diamond Contest.

programme.title: To Barcelona, With Love
programme.desc: Erica, an American translator, secretly revises a novel set in Barcelona. Everything is fine until bookstore owner Nico invites the credited author, Anna, to the city for a book-signing.

programme.title: To Barcelona, Forever
programme.desc: As Anna travels back to Barcelona, reuniting with Erica to celebrate her engagement to Nico, she meets a charming farmer and accidentally finds herself engaged to save his family's legacy.

programme.title: The Groomsmen First Look
programme.desc: A pediatrician and an overseas doctor, meet at a wedding in Philadelphia, but the long distance, family, and their friends may hinder their budding romance.

programme.title: The Chicken Sisters
programme.desc: Amanda and Frankie join forces to oust a pesky weasel who snuck into their house; Amanda tries to teach her daughter that she can handle anything.
